ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The color of the spell gem is supposed to reflect if it s self, party, targeted, AE, or point-blank.  A lot of these were messed up and the wrong color.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> "Many spell-gems and icons have been changed to reflect the appropriate
> action of the spell. Be sure to reacquaint yourself with your spell
> line-up."
>
> I'm not exactly sure what it means but I think it means there are a couple
> of new spell icons so every dang buff doesn't look exactly the same, I hope
> so anyway. Not necessary but a welcomed addition.

The color of the spell gem is supposed to reflect if it's
self, party, targeted, AE, or point-blank. A lot of these
were messed up and the wrong color. Guess they finally fixed
it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
